dcterms:creator: M. G. Bellemare
Y. Naddaf
J. Veness
M. Bowling
dcterms:description: The Arcade Learning Environment (ALE) is a popular platform for evaluating reinforcement learning agents, featuring various Atari games that present nuanced exploration challenges and a natural curriculum.
dcterms:title: Arcade Learning Environment (ALE)

dcterms:description: MinAtar is a new set of environments that captures the general mechanics of specific Atari games while simplifying the representational complexity to focus more on behavioral challenges.
dcterms:title: MinAtar

dcterms:creator: Y. Tassa
Y. Doron
A. Muldal
T. Erez
Y. Li
D. d. L. Casas
A. Lefrancq
dcterms:description: The DeepMind Control Suite provides a set of continuous control tasks for reinforcement learning, built upon the MuJoCo physics engine.
dcterms:title: DeepMind Control Suite

dcterms:creator: N. Tasfi
dcterms:description: The Pygame Learning Environment (PLE) provides a number of simple games with an ALE-style interface, allowing for visual representation or a vector of object positions.
dcterms:title: Pygame Learning Environment (PLE)

dcterms:creator: E. Todorov
T. Erez
Y. Tassa
dcterms:description: MuJoCo is a physics engine designed for model-based control, providing a platform for simulating complex physical interactions.
dcterms:title: MuJoCo

dcterms:creator: E. Talvitie
dcterms:description: Shooter is a domain used for model learning, resembling simplified Atari games that take place on a small grid.
dcterms:title: Shooter
